page.title: 14EVENTS IN BISHOPS LYDEARD
page.content: Apart from the usual jumble sales,sale of work etc.in aid of a charity or the funds of one of the organisations there are whole village events.Every June there is the Carnival.In July the Village Fete is organised by and at the Village Hall.There is also the Flower and Vegetable Show and the Children's Painting Competition.The Harvest is welcomed with Harvest Festivals,a Harvest Supper and the children giving Harvest gifts to the elderly living on their own.In November the village Firework Display is on the School field.Christmas is recognised in many ways-Carol singing,School Carol Service,Service of 12 Lessons and Father Christmas(despite a busy shedule throughout the world)spends some days at the Village Hall,this is arranged with him by the Playgroup.
